verses.verse: And he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> hath taken <S%H3947>away<s%> all that was our <S%H1>father<s%>'s; and of that which was our <S%H1>father<s%>'s hath he <S%H6213>gotten<s%> all this <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, <S%H8543>and<s%>, behold, it was not toward him as <S%H8032>beforetime<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and to thy <S%H4138>kindred<s%>; and I will be with thee.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> unto his <S%H6629>flock<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, I see your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, that it is not toward me <S%H8543>as<s%> <S%H8032>beforetime<s%>; but the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> hath been with <S%H1961>me<s%>.
And <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that with all my <S%H3581>power<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>.

And your <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H2498>me<s%>, and changed my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times<s%>; but <S%H430>God<s%> suffered <S%H5414>him<s%> not to <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H5978>me<s%>.

If he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5348>thus<s%>, The speckled shall be thy <S%H7939>wages<s%>; then all the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H5348>speckled<s%>: and if he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6124>thus<s%>, The ringstreaked shall be thy <S%H7939>wages<s%>; then <S%H3205>bare<s%> all the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H6124>ringstreaked<s%>.
Thus <S%H430>God<s%> hath taken <S%H5337>away<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, and given them to <S%H5414>me<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3179>conceive<s%>, that I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, <S%H6260>and<s%>, behold, the he-goats which <S%H5927>leaped<s%> upon the <S%H6629>flock<s%> were <S%H6124>ringstreaked<s%>, <S%H5348>speckled<s%>, and <S%H1261>grizzled<s%>.
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me in the <S%H2472>dream<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: and I <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> now thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>: all the <S%H6260>he-goats<s%> which <S%H5927>leap<s%> upon the <S%H6629>flock<s%> are <S%H6124>ringstreaked<s%>, <S%H5348>speckled<s%>, and <S%H1261>grizzled<s%>: for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that <S%H3837>Laban<s%> doeth unto <S%H6213>thee<s%>.

I am the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, where thou <S%H4886>anointedst<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, where thou <S%H5087>vowedst<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto <S%H6965>me<s%>: now arise, get thee <S%H3318>out<s%> from this <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H4138>nativity<s%>.

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2506>him<s%>, Is there yet any portion or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us in our <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>?
Are we not <S%H2803>accounted<s%> by him as <S%H5237>foreigners<s%>? for he hath <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H398>us<s%>, and hath also quite <S%H398>devoured<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%>.

For all the <S%H6239>riches<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5337>taken<s%> away from our <S%H1>father<s%>, that is ours and our <S%H1121>children<s%>'s: now <S%H430>then<s%>, whatsoever God hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>thee<s%>, do.
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H5375>set<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wives<s%> upon the <S%H1581>camels<s%>;

and he carried <S%H5090>away<s%> all his <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and all his <S%H7399>substance<s%> which he had <S%H7408>gathered<s%>, the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of his <S%H7075>getting<s%>, which he had <S%H7408>gathered<s%> in <S%H6307>Paddan-aram<s%>, to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.
Now <S%H3837>Laban<s%> was <S%H1980>gone<s%> to <S%H1494>shear<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H1589>stole<s%> the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%> that were her <S%H1>father<s%>'s.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> stole <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H3820>unawares<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%>, in <S%H5921>that<s%> he <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H1097>not<s%> that he <S%H1272>fled<s%>.

So he <S%H1272>fled<s%> with all that he <S%H6965>had<s%>; and he rose up, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H1272>fled<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> with <S%H7291>him<s%>, and pursued after <S%H310>him<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%>; and he <S%H1692>overtook<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8104>him<s%>, Take heed to thyself that thou <S%H1696>speak<s%> not <S%H5973>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5381>came<s%> up with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H8628>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H8628>encamped<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, What hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%>, that thou hast stolen <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H3824>unawares<s%> to <S%H5090>me<s%>, and carried away my <S%H1323>daughters<s%> as <S%H7617>captives<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>?

Wherefore didst thou <S%H1272>flee<s%> <S%H2244>secretly<s%>, and steal <S%H1589>away<s%> from <S%H5046>me<s%>, and didst not tell <S%H7971>me<s%>, that I might have sent thee away with <S%H8057>mirth<s%> and with <S%H7892>songs<s%>, with <S%H8596>tabret<s%> and with <S%H3658>harp<s%>;
and didst not <S%H5203>suffer<s%> me to <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>? now hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5528>foolishly<s%>.

It <S%H3426>is<s%> in the <S%H410>power<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H7451>hurt<s%>: but the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me <S%H570>yesternight<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself that thou speak <S%H1696>not<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%>.

And <S%H1980>now<s%>, though thou wouldest needs be <S%H1980>gone<s%>, because thou <S%H3700>sore<s%> <S%H3700>longedst<s%> after thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, yet wherefore hast thou <S%H1589>stolen<s%> my <S%H430>gods<s%>?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, Because I was <S%H3372>afraid<s%>: for I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6435>Lest<s%> thou shouldest take thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from me by <S%H1497>force<s%>.

With <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> thou <S%H4672>findest<s%> thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, he shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>: <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5234>discern<s%> thou what is thine with <S%H3947>me<s%>, and take it to <S%H3290>thee<s%>. For Jacob <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had stolen <S%H1589>them<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H168>tent<s%>, and into <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H168>tent<s%>, and into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H519>maid-servants<s%>; but he <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H3318>not<s%>. And he went out of <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H168>tent<s%>.

Now <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H1581>camel<s%>'s <S%H3733>saddle<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon <S%H3837>them<s%>. And Laban <S%H4959>felt<s%> about all the <S%H168>tent<s%>, but found them <S%H4672>not<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father<s%>, Let not my <S%H113>lord<s%> be <S%H2734>angry<s%> that I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>; for the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> is upon <S%H2664>me<s%>. And he searched, but <S%H4672>found<s%> not the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>, and <S%H7378>chode<s%> with <S%H3837>Laban<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, What is my <S%H6588>trespass<s%>? what is my <S%H2403>sin<s%>, that thou hast hotly <S%H1814>pursued<s%> after <S%H310>me<s%>?

Whereas <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H4959>felt<s%> about all my <S%H3627>stuff<s%>, what hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> of all thy <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff<s%>? <S%H7760>Set<s%> it <S%H3541>here<s%> before my <S%H251>brethren<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, that they may <S%H3198>judge<s%> <S%H996>betwixt<s%> us <S%H8147>two<s%>.

These <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have I been with <S%H7353>thee<s%>; thy ewes and thy <S%H5795>she-goats<s%> have not cast their <S%H7921>young<s%>, and the <S%H352>rams<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%> have I not <S%H398>eaten<s%>.

That which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> of beasts I <S%H935>brought<s%> not unto <S%H2398>thee<s%>; I bare the loss of <S%H3027>it<s%>; of my hand didst thou <S%H1245>require<s%> <S%H1589>it<s%>, whether stolen by <S%H3117>day<s%> or <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

Thus I <S%H3117>was<s%>; in the day the <S%H2721>drought<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H7140>me<s%>, and the frost by <S%H3915>night<s%>; and my <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H5074>fled<s%> from mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

These <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have I been in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>; I served <S%H5647>thee<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>: and thou hast <S%H2498>changed<s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times<s%>.

Except <S%H3884><s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and the <S%H6343>Fear<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, had been with <S%H7971>me<s%>, surely now hadst thou sent me away <S%H7387>empty<s%>. <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and <S%H3198>rebuked<s%> thee <S%H570>yesternight<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> are my <S%H1121>children<s%>, and the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> are my <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and all that thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> is <S%H6213>mine<s%>: and what can I do this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto these my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> unto their <S%H1121>children<s%> whom they have <S%H3205>borne<s%>?
And now <S%H3212>come<s%>, let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, I and <S%H5707>thou<s%>; and let it be for a witness between me and thee.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and set it <S%H7311>up<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H3950>Gather<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>; and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1530>heap<s%>: and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> there by the <S%H1530>heap<s%>.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H3026>Jegar-saha<s%>-dutha: but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H1567>Galeed<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This <S%H1530>heap<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> between me and thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>. Therefore was the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1567>Galeed<s%>:
and <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, <S%H834>for<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> between me and <S%H5641>thee<s%>, when we are absent <S%H376>one<s%> from <S%H7453>another<s%>.

If thou shalt <S%H6031>afflict<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and if thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H5921>besides<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, no <S%H376>man<s%> is with <S%H7200>us<s%>; see, <S%H430>God<s%> is witness betwixt me and <S%H5707>thee<s%>.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Behold this <S%H1530>heap<s%>, and behold the <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, which I have set betwixt me and <S%H3384>thee<s%>.

This <S%H1530>heap<s%> be <S%H5707>witness<s%>, and the <S%H4676>pillar<s%> be <S%H5713>witness<s%>, that I will not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H1530>heap<s%> to <S%H5674>thee<s%>, and that thou shalt not pass over this <S%H1530>heap<s%> and this <S%H4676>pillar<s%> unto <S%H7451>me<s%>, for harm.

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%> betwixt <S%H3290>us<s%>. And Jacob <S%H7650>sware<s%> by the <S%H6343>Fear<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and tarried all <S%H3885>night<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

And <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> rose <S%H7925>up<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3837>them<s%>: and Laban <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>.
